text: @realDonaldTrump You called governors ‘weak,’ and urged them to use force against unruly protests. If you think the governors are weak, where are you all this time...you are nowhere to be seen. During your presidential watch, we have only seen over 100+k deaths from Covid-19 and civil unrest.
